steps.description: Made with Scribe - https://scribehow.com1 Setup forwarding for an extension in 3Cx 1 Navigate to the 3CX Admin Console 2 Click "Inbound Rules" Made with Scribe - https://scribehow.com2 3 Click the rule you want to modify 4 Select the new destination for calls during office hours and/or outside office hours Made with Scribe - https://scribehow.com3 5 Click "OK"
